## Plot.createHierarchy() method

Create a hierarchy from a set of data view rows.

This is a static helper used to transform rows into a hierarchical representation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createHierarchy(rows: DataViewRow[], axisName: string): Promise<DataViewHierarchyNode>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rows | <code>DataViewRow[]</code> | A list of rows to construct the hierarchy from. |
|  axisName | <code>string</code> | The hierarchical axis. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<DataViewHierarchyNode>`
